name: L-Butt Options
description: defines and gives access to L-Butt joint and its parameters

inputParameters.name: SmallBeamButts
inputParameters.description: If true, the beam with a larger cross-section is considered as the cross beam.

inputParameters.name: ModifyCross
inputParameters.description: If true, the cross beam is extended to the opposite face of the main beam and cut flush with it.

inputParameters.name: RejectI
inputParameters.description: If true, joint will not apply when the cross beam meets the main beam in an I topology.
